name: Sudoku
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sudoku game
des:
Welcome to the Sudoku game skill. This skill offers you 4 levels of difficulty suitable for everyone. Also, you get 5 different themes. 
To open the game say "open sudoku game"
To play the game say "play", to set a number in the grid cell of sudoku board say "put 5 at i8"(this will set 5 at the ith row and 8th column)
To check if the Sudoku is correct or wrong, say "check"
You can also say 'leaderboard' to view the leaderboard(Leaderboard is currently not available and will be visible once sufficient users are available)
Points according to difficulty:
5 points in Easy level
15 points in Normal level
25 points in Hard level
50 points in Challenging level

The main screen shows your Overall points, level-wise points are shown on play screens for each level.

You will also get 10 points for playing the game daily, 50 points for playing 5 games each day.

To provide feedback/suggestions send an email on deepakrai1508@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
